casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tilmon Charles GOLPHIN 441A98-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 20, 2018 Jay H. Ferguson, Kenneth J. Rose, Attorneys at Law, for Golphin, Tilmon Charles. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, for State of N.C. James E. Williams, Jr., Burton Craige, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Grady Jessup, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Association of Black Lawyers. Lisa A. Bakale-Wise, Irving Joyner, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. State Conference of the NAACP. Edward Joseph Blocher, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Social Scientists. Janet Moore, Attorney at Law, for National Assocation for Public Defense. Robert P. Mosteller, Attorney at Law, for Professors John Charles Boger & Robert P. Mosteller. Carlos E. Mahoney, Attorney at Law, Jin Hee Lee, W. Kerrel Murray, Attorneys at Law, Pro Hac Vice, for NAACP Legal Defense and Educational Defense Fund, Inc. Cynthia F. Adcock, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Council of Churches. Jeremy M. Falcone, Attorney at Law, for Former State and Federal Prosecutors. William R. West, District Attorney, for State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2018 by Former State and Federal Prosecutors to admit Robert L. Walker Pro Hac Vice: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of July 2018." Beasley, J. rescued
